column1: What do you call a crazy bug that lives in space? a lunar-tick
column4: The lunar phase influences the behavior of various nocturnal creatures
column5: The tick is known for feeding on the blood of its hosts.

column1: What do you call a homeless horse? unstable.
column4: The building was unstable and had to be evacuated
column5: His emotional state was considered unstable after the traumatic event.

column1: Why do you call a mexican midget a paragraph? ...because hes too short to be called an essay.
column3: a distinct section of a piece of writing
column4: The professor asked us to write a five-paragraph essay on the topic
column5: The paragraph of text was too short to convey a complete thought.

column1: What do you call the hairiest man in the camp? jewbacca.
column3: a play on Chewbacca and a Jewish stereotype
column4: The character Chewbacca from Star Wars is known for his hairiness
column5: The man had a charming personality and was affectionate, earning the nickname among friends.

column1: Whats the worst part about being a pedophile? trying to fit in.
column4: The puzzle pieces fit together perfectly to create a beautiful image
column5: It was difficult for him to fit into the social group given his unconventional interests.
